website_summaries.verdict: One of the higher-quality flat benches available for online purchase, this model is sure to impress.
pros: Oversized design for those wanting a larger workout space
Steel frame ensures product will last for years to come
cons: Customers have noted the the pad cushion can feel a little flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Great for our home Gym
customer_reviews.text: We love this Marcy Flat bench, it fit perfect in our home gym - pictures and how we build our home gym you can found at[...] Easy to assemble, looking just like described.
customer_reviews.author: Ivo Degoh

customer_reviews.title: Great bench & great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my own home gym use. 1. Arrived in time 2. Arrived securely packaged to prevent damages to the bench 3. All parts were in package 4. Easily put together 5. Sturdy construction. Thick metal & welded joints. Thick screws, bolts & nuts 6. Bench is comfortable & solid. No wobbling when using it. Great product overall. No cons thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Knight

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this bench because it looked sturdy enough to support my 250 lb body with these ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased this bench for home workouts. We use it for a variety of exercises. Some of the exercises involve us laying or sitting on bench. Others are tougher on the bench such as step-ups, jump-ups, etc. We purchased this bench because it looked sturdy enough to support my 250 lb body with these types of exercises. So far it does that well and we would expect it to last a long time based on the quality.
customer_reviews.author: fengine8

customer_reviews.title: Best short flat bench
customer_reviews.text: Assembly: Very easy (1 person job) took about 10 minutes This flat bench is excellent. Perfect in size and it is also very durable. I enjoy how wide of a bench this one is. When using it for bench pressing my upper back was perfectly intact with the bench when getting into position. The legs being long flat bars also gives it a great durability when performing an exercise with heavy weights. The distribution of weight was balanced. Best bench purchase for my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy bench.
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 15 minutes to put together and turned out pretty nice. It's a very sturdy bench as I am a 400 lb man and it doesn't even complain when I use it with weights. The only thing I can fault it for is being a toe stabbing hazard. The metal legs and heavy frame make for a lot of cursing and hopping around if you catch it just right.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Super impressed! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am impressed! I did not think this bench would be anything like it is. I actually prefer this one to the one I use consistently at the gym....it's that good. Easy to assemble, clear instructions, and it was actually bigger than the picture made it seem which is GOOD! I almost spent twice as much on a different one because I thought it was bigger. Glad I didn't! It's got perfect padding, very comfortable, it's so sturdy and I use these benches for hardcore workouts, with a lot of weight and pressure, so this is absolutely perfect!! So excited to get good quality workouts in at home!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cortese

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty feet and legs, flimsy MDF cushion board.
customer_reviews.text: The one I ordered happened to be defective (bolt holes too small for bolts. Couldn't be assembled). The legs and feet are heavy duty. The actually pad, not so much. Don't think it could sustain a very heavy person.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Santa

customer_reviews.title: Marcy's machinists and QC get  flunking grade.
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE!!!...Adding spacers between the four base brackets was necessary to align those four brackets with the four threaded holes underneath the padded top. The only other possibilty was to file or drill to enlarge the holes in the brackets but I avoided that for fear of making the holes too wide for the washers. A fourth washer was also missing from the packaging. I think the unit will work but I give Marcy's machinists and QC a flunking grade on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Frank N. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Try it -- you'll like it
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money, a little short for me but I'm 6' 3". It will be great if you are 6 feet tall or less. Sturdy enough for dumbbell presses and flat flies. I don't bench press anymore so I can't report on that. Some people commented on having difficulty in assembly, I did not have any problems. It took 30 minutes from the front porch to completely assembled. When you attach the two cross bars on the legs to form the base {feet}, 4 bolts on each, do not tighten any of the four until you have started all 4. This will give a little room to move and get the holes aligned.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Neal Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised at the quality of this bench given the price. I've owned a lot of Rogue equipment in the past, and while this definitely isn't Rogue quality, which is unnecessarily over-engineered, it's incredibly sturdy and well built. It puts together easy, and was totally flat after assembly. I'm 6'2, 200lbs and it doesn't wobble at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I can lay down flat on my back with no problems working out with 10 & 15 lbs. dumbbells. So far, I can't find any issues with it. I'm 5'6 in height, around 190 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: gabazero

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for - great bench!
customer_reviews.text: This bench was exactly what we were looking for. It's light enough that we can move it easily, but also sturdy and very comfortable. Assembly was easy - it took us less than 1/2 hour. We followed a tip from another reviewer - tighten bolts very loosely at first in case the holes are not perfectly aligned, then tighten as the final step in each stage. Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Bench!
customer_reviews.text: Black padded top which is great quality with very sturdy legs and base. I need to use it way more than I do (lol). I would recommend to anyone looking for stable bench. It's heavy but that's a good thing. I find it hard to work out on the floor so I added it for basic light weight lifting and some exercises with my yoga sling... great support for back and helps not having to get up from the floor. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kat j

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, sturdy bench. It has good stability so far. Will know more about that after using it more. The padding is sufficient. It weighs around 30 pounds, so it can be moved around easily. Assembly is straight forward. Don't tighten the bolts until everything is assembled. This will allow some play to accommodate any alignment issues with the parts being connected. Assembly took maybe 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bench overall
customer_reviews.text: We got this bench to use in our home gym, and so far it’s a good bench, pretty sturdy but it does wobble a little. We have to keep plates on the feet so to ensure that it doesn’t slide around while using it for certain exercises. Wish the feet had a bit more weight to them so it wouldn’t move around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this bench! Took about 30 minutes to assemble but it’s sturdy and looks terrific. I bought it to replace my wobbly old bench that had one leg slightly shorter than the others. I like to do step ups and just wish this was a few inches taller. Otherwise great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jen L

customer_reviews.title: Good product but be careful unpacking parts
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give a bad review if this is partially my fault. The bench looks great, got it on time. Took out the 4 large parts and the shrink wrapped small package of parts and instructions. Threw box away. Now, two days later, I’m making it and there were 4 small L brackets that I need but I don’t have. They are not in the shrink wrapped package and I thought I was very careful to inspect the box before throwing it away. So be very careful when unpacking this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a much higher bench I had used previously. I was worried about the lower height, and it turns out I love it. This bench is totally stable, has a firm but comfortable pad, and is a good length, width, and height. I use it every other day, and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: CROOKED. Not flat.
customer_reviews.text: Bench is slanted to left; verified and proved by level measurer. I added two separate pictures of the level of the bench which is slanted and the floor it laying on which is flat and leveled. Too big and difficult to return and ship. Lost money.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Bench
customer_reviews.text: Been using this purchase now for over a year, this bench is very strong and durable. Got it to do step ups with my workout, and it is solid. It is not adjustable, so you wont be able to do any incline presses or anything like that that you could do with an incline bench, but this one is worth the money if you just need a very dependable and sturdy bench for basic exercises.
customer_reviews.author: adam kennington

customer_reviews.title: He says that there isn't too much cushioning which is good for someone who wants to lift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. He uses it to lift weight using his squat rack. He likes it -- works well for someone who is 6'1 and is lifting a lot of weight. He says that there isn't too much cushioning which is good for someone who wants to lift.
customer_reviews.author: Kingey

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great bench. Feels very sturdy, has wide top and was easy to install. Only complaint are the feet. Wish it has some sort of rubber footing . Other than that, great bench that should serve me well.
customer_reviews.author: Tyfighter

customer_reviews.title: Hard,Sturdy,Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: read some positive and negative reviews before i purchased this....dont understand the negatives...took me 1/2 hour to assemble and looks great...very sturdy on my carpet ....the seat is very hard,,and the product is strong...this will last for many years!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: bw

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench, needs rubber feet.
customer_reviews.text: I think the bench is a great tool for a home gym or weekend warriors. I will say it’s pretty sturdy for the price and fairly easy to put together. One thing I don’t like is it doesn’t have rubber feet. I have tried to use this on carpet for hip thrusts and is slides out. Other then that it holds me (6’2 215lbs) easily. I would recommend buying if you need a starter bench or something to is basic.
customer_reviews.author: Bradly G.

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine gains
customer_reviews.text: A life saver during quarantine. Everyone is reselling benches for about 150 so this being in stock was a definite “must buy”. It’s a great and sturdy bench only thing is if you don’t add your own rubber mat of some kind at the bottom it does slide around a lot. But since I have a rubber runner for under it’s been amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessyka Quisquino

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, great quality, easy to assemble. This bench works well for a medium or short person. A tall person may want to note the length and possibly go to the next size up. Otherwise, This is a very comfortable bench.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! 👍
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with my purchase of this bench. With the gyms being closed, I didn't have much equipment to use. Needed a weight bench to use, this one was perfect size and sturdy. Easy to put together as well!! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Babydoll

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long term use.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the bench for just about 2 months or so. The bench was fine at first it isn’t that sturdy. But the problem is the seat has already ripped which is a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Nader Ramli

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for $76
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench. Sturdy and simple to assemble. Great for the price wish the leather was better. It's a touch shorter than I thought it was but no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Run159

customer_reviews.title: Suits the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a stable platform for arm and shoulder work that could easily be used indoors without looking too much out of place for someone with a training history that goes back 50+ years.. The bench is compact and easily portable, even for a post-operative 70-something like me. Reasonably priced. Would not hesitate to recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C. Marchant

customer_reviews.title: Missing assembling tools!
customer_reviews.text: Came completely with out tools. So DISAPPOINTED!!! Order another one and this one has to drop off to UPS. Waist of time so unprofessional!
customer_reviews.author: maruk

customer_reviews.title: Tips forward when you are towards the end of it and end caps fall off
customer_reviews.text: Not super impressed, the end caps don't fit and constantly fall out, but more importantly, when you are at the endge of the bench it tips forward. I would look to find something more stable personally and spend a little more money on somethign that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Helm

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Weight Bench
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Sturdy, well made, a friend assembled it in 20 min for me, fantastic! I am so happy with this weight bench!!
customer_reviews.author: Cal Gal

customer_reviews.title: Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is very well made! Easy to assemble. Materials are high quality. Padding is comfortable. Base is solid and sturdy. Great addition to my home gym! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good price
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by how heavy and sturdy. Good price point. I suggest anyone when assembling it, don’t tight the screw until all screw inserted in the thread.
customer_reviews.author: Qstav

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Stitching is loose in one area. Need to buy something for the feet so the metal doesn’t scratch the floor. Other than that, pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid, no wobble!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bench that doesn't wobble. This was a great choice. The assembly is easy and the stability is legit. This belongs in the gym or home.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Cradduck

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: Great bench. I'm 270 and that gives me around 330 pounds to play with as the max weight is listed at 600. Very pleased and very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Well Built....
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a bench worth buying... it’s very sturdy... though shorter... it works well... I weigh 330lbs, and it’s unmovable. Would denifitely buy a second.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Lee Foote'

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bench!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench!!! It is very well made, not flimsy at all, good padding, perfect height for many different exercises, good width and length. I would definitely recommend this bench for a home gym!!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Malet

customer_reviews.title: Great for home
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my home gym. I was a little worried about reviews saying it was wobbly, but I didn't have that problem at all. Took like 10 minutes to assemble and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Akins

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good workout bench for what it is
customer_reviews.text: I'm not super picky; I mostly just wanted a workout bench that didn't squeak and had enough length for my torso since I'm fairly tall. This bench is sturdy and well-made, and I haven't had any issues with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: April Horne

customer_reviews.title: The bottom support came dented. I contacted the manufacture ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottom support came dented. I contacted the manufacture and it took them 3 months to send me a replacement part. They said it would take a week. When it came it was the wrong part. At that point I gave up and have decided to boycott Marcy products.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Kempe

customer_reviews.title: Not My Type
customer_reviews.text: I returned the product. It was not to my expectations for the exercising I would be doing. I went to a another type.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Boop

customer_reviews.title: Works for me..
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 5'5 and it's perfect for what I use it for. I use it primarily for benching using my squat rack. It's sturdy and low profile so I can keep my feet firmly on the floor. I do feel a little bit of flex when I sit on the very end of either side (I weigh about 175), other than that I think it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, a little short for a tall person
customer_reviews.text: I'm not too much taller than average, but the bench is just a little shorter than I would like it. Very happy with the price and the quality of the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Acrimonial

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Solid
customer_reviews.text: Quality, sturdy and strong. This was a good purchase for me. Met all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: mel mallard

customer_reviews.title: High quality workout bench.
customer_reviews.text: High quality materials but 4 stars because i received 2 bolts that were faulty and had trouble getting them seated properly. I was not given any extra. Still a great deal and is nice sturdy and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy naquin

customer_reviews.title: Solid bench - great price!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected and it stay outside year round in Texas. Well made, solid and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dunkel

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but great quality and comfortable bench...good size too
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Solid bench, length a little short
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy design with minimal wobble. Only downside was the bench is just a little short length wise. While setting up for bench press I have to sit on the very edge before laying down, otherwise my head is completely off pad.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Easily a steal compared to most $150+ benches
customer_reviews.text: Stable enough for any home gym needs. Quick assembly. Easily a steal compared to most $150+ benches. Do it.
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for my son . It was easy to put together and is very well made. He uses it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hart

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny !
customer_reviews.text: Well built and sturdy and comfortable padding. I can see this lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Basic and sturdy, just like me ;-)
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a basic and sturdy bench for my workouts. This fit the bill perfectly. Assembly couldn't be simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Is this worth double of the lower end Marcy bench?
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty bench! Is it Good? Worth it than the Sub $40 Marcy Bench? I would think so. I have both and this one is definitely a lot more stable and just much more heavy duty. The steel legs are thick and sturdy. You get what you pay for. I bought this when it was on sale at $63.99. It's usually in the $80-90s. At that range, spend over $100, you'll have a fully welded legs. These legs are bolted together, you still get a slight wobble. The sub $40 marcy bench wobbles like crazy. Again, you get what you pay for! Overall, not great deal for $64. 4 Stars for $80-90.
customer_reviews.author: TKO

customer_reviews.title: a perfectly fine bench
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my garage gym and it works as I would hope - sturdy and light. I docked one star because the end caps on the legs aren't as snug as they should be so I had to glue them on.
customer_reviews.author: William Davis

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size bolts
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very happy with the product itself. I watched videos online of people assembling this same bench because I thought I was crazy. Its as if they sent me different hardware to assemble the bench. The bolts are either too big or too small to fully assemble the bench.
customer_reviews.author: Garcia

customer_reviews.title: solid bench
customer_reviews.text: Great bench. It's very sturdy and not too difficult to put together. Good addition to at home gyms.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable padding
customer_reviews.text: This bench is a good size for home strength training. Simple assembly. Very sturdy. Well padded.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Bench
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Took about 10 minutes to set up. The bench is light, and serves its purpose. It’s not as okie as I thought it would be, but overall a good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Randy A.

customer_reviews.title: feedback
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be on a mat or it scoots around, otherwise nice little bench
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great for money
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is a really great bench. Theres quite a bit of padding but not too much for heavy benches. Was slightly skeptical about getting the white bench but paint looks fantastic and is holding up nicely. Would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Big Man Approved
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the sturdiness of this bench for someone my size. I’m 6”6” 400+ lbs so strength of this bench matters tremendously. I can tell every person looking for a solid bench that won’t wobble or make terrifying noises when you get on it that this is the one you are looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Bayou Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble. Sturdy. Long enough to lay down and do chest presses on.
customer_reviews.author: Xman

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The wood supporting the foam is super thin. Made a cracking sound / feeling when I picked up the top by the end. Pretty sad when the weight of just the bench top is too much for it to support. I stopped, put everything back in the box, and sent it back. Get a 1000lb rated bench for $20 more!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for about a month now. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about a month now. It's holding up quite well, and I'm a rather large dude at 6'5".
customer_reviews.author: HURG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but wobbly
customer_reviews.text: A little wobbly but looks nice in my home gym area. It’s comfirtable for back exercises but maybe not the best for steps since it wobbles.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, easy assembly, decent bench for a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: gkrass

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money !
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t disappoint! It’s just right for home workouts - padding is comfortable, nothing cheap about the construction ... this bench is worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bergoch

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my basement gym
customer_reviews.text: This is great bench! It was easy to assemble by myself. Its lightweight and comfortable to do presses on. I would like it a bit better if was a bit wider, but otherwise its a perfect fit for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: The Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’8 185 Pound I Lift between 40-80 pound dumbbells I don’t think you can find something better, This bench is “La Ostia”
customer_reviews.author: Herbert NM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Wish I had a bench that tilted
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Wish I had a bench that tilted, but couldn't afford it. This is what it appears, a solid workout bench for a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Connecticut Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble with the tools given because of how difficult it was to tighten some of the areas.
customer_reviews.author: Mikko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bench. Solid! I put it together in a few minutes and it feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well-built, surprised that the base of the bench itself was wood. It is wider than the benches I used in the gym which my 6' hubby appreciates. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby's umma

customer_reviews.title: Marcy Products are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase as a matter of fact I’m looking for a decline/incline bench as we speak
customer_reviews.author: Jim A.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This is the one you want, not its discount cousin. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Publius Fegg

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far. I use it for bench ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. I use it for bench press and sitting between squat and deadlift sets.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: always used an exercise ball to fill in for a ...
customer_reviews.text: always used an exercise ball to fill in for a bench in the past, should have got this sooner
customer_reviews.author: michael seeman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can I say it is a bench. It seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and actually big enough.
customer_reviews.text: The bench was easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I bought the bigger size because I am 6'2". I'm glad I did. It is plenty long enough for me, with a few inches to spare. So far I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Not straight!
customer_reviews.text: The support legs are about a half an inch off. It doesn't sit level at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality product which is easily assembled without the need for any tools other than ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product which is easily assembled without the need for any tools other than an adjustable wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cote

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier than expected, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bench feels very sturdy. Base feels gym quality, hopefully the cover lasts. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for this price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, easy to assemble. I'm not a very heavy individual so it works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Arias

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Bench. As good a these ones in a professional gym.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, easy setup bench
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. It is sturdy enough to hold me, 5-10/220, but still easy to move around my little gym. I will definitely buy more Marcy products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Bell

customer_reviews.title: simple solid bench
customer_reviews.text: put it together and used mine this morning. zero wobble. solid bench. just what I need right now.
customer_reviews.author: B. Florence

customer_reviews.title: Very solid.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and stable. Kids jump on it to (don’t know why) yet the stitching on the cushion has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amar

customer_reviews.title: seems sturdy. Max weight does read max user weight 300lbs
customer_reviews.text: Just put it together, seems sturdy. Max weight does read max user weight 300lbs. Will. E putting to test for bench press soon
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Good all around bench
customer_reviews.text: Great all around bench. I'm not an avid weight lifter but I want to keep healthy and this was a great addition to my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Mehl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy, it looks like it will last a while
customer_reviews.author: joeyjojo

customer_reviews.title: Bad all around
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box and missing parts. End caps on feet are gone and the trim around the bench is fraying. Not even put together in the thing is falling apart. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Googan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted! Enough cushion and easy set up. I would recommend this bench to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very stable
customer_reviews.text: For under a c note this is a great flat bench
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bench
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench sturdy no complaints really. I can do my workouts on it fine.
customer_reviews.author: Beka

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’1” 185 lbs and love this bench. It’s long, tall and sturdy. Perfect for all dumb bell workouts
customer_reviews.author: E. Lee Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench
customer_reviews.text: Great bench for a home gym . Nice material and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: Got delayed in deilever a few days, then when got bench a hole was missing in the frame so couldn't assembly correctly. Waste on time and now have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Rmj7687

product_meta.title: Marcy Deluxe Versatile Flat Bench Workout Utility Bench with Steel Frame
feature_bullets: Thick High-density Foam – The Marcy Deluxe Flat Bench sports an oversized bench seat with a 2.5” seat pad. It features high-density foam padding with a double-stitched vinyl cover for comfort and functionality.
Durable Construction – This ergonomic weight bench has a large diameter steel tubing frame with a powder-coated finish. The bench exemplifies sturdiness and durability.

Low-profile Design– This bench has a low-profile design. It consumes minimal space in order to grant more room for your other equipment. Aesthetically, it can be placed anywhere at home, whether in a bedroom or the garage.

Max Capacity of 600 Lbs – The maximum user weight capacity of this flat bench is 300 pounds minus the weights. It has dimensions of 44 (L) x 19 (W) x 17 (H) inches, meaning that it can be used for a variety of workouts.
Versatile Bench – Suitable for various training routines, this multipurpose bench can be used for home fitness routines such as strength training exercises, free weights, and crunches.
